specifications.Finish: Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel.
specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Appearance > Scalloped Scalloped edges feature a series of rounded, wave-like curves along fabric hems or trims, adding a delicate and elegant detail that enhances the garment's overall appearance.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Line dry Do not tumble dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Dresses
